Alex Horne is no stranger to TV success as he's the creator and co-host of Taskmaster.
However, Horne is now beginning a new TV project as he's soon set to launch a scripted comedy series on Channel… [+2299 chars]

articles.content:
Great news, Michael McIntyre fans! The comedian and TV presenter is heading back to our screens with not one, but two of his classic shows.
